casebody.data:
Ex parte AUTOMATIC SWITCH COMPANY OF BALTIMORE CITY, PETITIONER. PETITION FOR WRIT OF MANDAMUS. No. 18,

Original.

Argued February 19, 1906. Decided March 19, 1906. Decided on authority of Ex parle National'Enameling and Stamping Co,, ante, p. 156. Mr. Philip Mauro, with whom Mr. Harold Binney and Mr. C. A. L. Massie were on the brief, for petitioner.1 Mr. W. Clyde Jones, with whom Air. John Ridout was-on the brief, for respondent.

For abstracts of arguments of counsel see ante, p. 157, 158.

 Mr. Justice Brewer

delivered the opinion of the court.

This case, though differing in its facts somewhat from the one immediately preceding, presents the same question, and the same order will be entered.
